scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on inferred features.
initial_goal: Determine which customers are most likely to churn based on publicly available model predictions.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: The model predicts customer churn for a large retail bank's credit card division.  The model's API is publicly accessible but rate-limited. The attacker is aiming to identify high net-worth individuals likely to churn in order to target them with poaching offers from a competitor.
